Container.Name: patbridnoaria
Container.Overview:
realdebrid blackhole downloader without the need for aria2
Converted By Community Applications Always verify this template (and values) against the support page for the container
https://hub.docker.com/r/datpat/patbridnoaria/
REAL_DEBRID_API_KEY, WATCH_DIR = '/watch', DOWNLOAD_DIR = '/download', WATCH_RATE = 5000

Config.Name: WATCH_RATE
Config.Description: how frequently should the folders be checked for new torrent or magnet files?

Config.Name: DOWNLOAD_DIR
Config.Description: where should the files be downloaded to?

Config.Name: WATCH_DIR
Config.Description: Where sonarr and radarr put the torrent and magnet files
